doc:
Beatrice Pearson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beatrice_Pearson 0 Beatrice Pearson (27 July 1920 – February 1986) was an American actress, probably best known for her role as co-star in the 1948 film noir Force of Evil. She won a Theatre World Award in 1946 for Outstanding Broadway Debut Performance in The Mermaids Singing by John Van Druten.Beatrice Pearson was born on 27 July 1920 in Denison, Texas, US. She died in February 1986. Beatrice_Pearson ( 27_July_1920 – February_1986 ) was an_American_actress , probably best_known for her_role as co-star in the_1948_film_noir_Force of Evil . She won a_Theatre_World_Award in 1946 for Outstanding_Broadway_Debut_Performance in The_Mermaids_Singing by John_Van_Druten.Beatrice_Pearson was_born on 27_July_1920 in Denison , Texas , US . She died in February_1986 .
